mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_prnt_base.select */ SELECT prnt_no /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,prnt_nm /* prnt_nm 학부모_명 character varying(40) */ ,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,bmi_val /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */ ,race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tm_prnt_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND prnt_no = #{prntNo} /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_prnt_base.insert */ INSERT INTO tm_prnt_base ( prnt_no /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,prnt_nm /* prnt_nm 학부모_명 character varying(40) */
,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,bmi_val /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{prntNo} /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{prntNm} /* prnt_nm 학부모_명 character varying(40) */
,#{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,#{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,#{bmiVal} /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,#{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_prnt_base.update */ UPDATE tm_prnt_base
,prnt_nm = #{prntNm} /* prnt_nm 학부모_명 character varying(40) */
,hght_val = #{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,bmi_val = #{bmiVal} /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd = #{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND prnt_no = #{prntNo} /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_prnt_base.merge */ INSERT INTO tm_prnt_base ( prnt_no /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,prnt_nm /* prnt_nm 학부모_명 character varying(40) */
,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,bmi_val /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{prntNo} /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{prntNm} /* prnt_nm 학부모_명 character varying(40) */
,#{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,#{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,#{bmiVal} /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,#{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,prnt_nm = #{prntNm} /* prnt_nm 학부모_명 character varying(40) */
,hght_val = #{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,bmi_val = #{bmiVal} /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd = #{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_prnt_base.delete */ DELETE FROM tm_prnt_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND prnt_no = #{prntNo} /* prnt_no 학부모_번호 numeric */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
